sub_title: Water Resources Management/ Integrated Rural Development
summary:
Michiel has over 20 years of experience as a team leader, project manager, evaluator and thematic expert in integrated water management, Water Sanitation and Hygiene, agriculture and governance in Africa, Middle East and Latin America.  

He advises NGOs and, national and local governments, water utilities. Topics: Watershed management, project management, multi stakeholder processes, participatory planning and monitoring, Environmental Services, Sanitation Marketing, Natural Capital, regional development, water related risks and mitigation, climate resilience, accountability, organisational/institutional development, solar powered water pumping, learning, sustainable development.
Coaches students and young professionals.
He is member of the Supervisory Board of Microjustice4All.

[{'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 1987}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 1989}}, 'role': 'Draft/edit technical development guidelines', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'de Boerengroep Wageningen', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'POVERTY_ALLEVIATION', 'description': None}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Supervisory Board Member', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Microjustice4All', 'logo': None, 'url': None}, 'cause': 'HUMANITARIAN_RELIEF', 'description': 'Legal protection is the basis for development and a prerequisite for peace and democracy, because:

◾Lack of legal power and protection is a major reason why people fall into, and remain in, poverty. 
◾For example land tenure security for men and women will increase their ability to invest wisely in land and natural resources. 

All citizens need fair, affordable and timely legal services for full legal participation: 
◾All persons should have a voice in how services like water, health care and education are delivered.
◾Everyone should have access to fair, effective forums for resolving conflicts, for seeking protection from violence and for addressing grievances with the state.
 
info@microjustice4all.org
http://www.microjustice4all.org/'}]
